item.title: Fine-tuning BERT Models for NLP Tasks in Azure
item.description: Deep Learning Insights & Application Introduction # Natural Language Processing (NLP) has revolutionized the way businesses interact with and understand their customers. From sentiment analysis to named entity recognition and chatbots, NLP applications are increasingly important for extracting insights and automating communication. In this domain, transformer models like BERT (Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers) have set new standards for performance. Azure Machine Learning provides a comprehensive environment for training, fine-tuning, and deploying NLP models efficiently.
